test_cases.objective: To ensure the system continuously monitors temperature in GMP storage areas as per URS-EMS-001.

test_steps.action: Set up the system to monitor temperature in a GMP storage area.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays real-time temperature readings.

test_steps.action: Verify temperature readings are recorded at intervals not exceeding 5 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Temperature data is logged every 5 minutes.

data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete

test_cases.test_name: Validate Alarm Generation for Temperature Deviations
test_cases.objective: To confirm the system generates alerts when temperature deviates ±2°C from setpoint as per URS-EMS-005.

test_steps.action: Set the temperature setpoint to 25°C.
test_steps.expected_result: Setpoint is successfully configured.

test_steps.action: Simulate a temperature deviation to 27°C.
test_steps.expected_result: System generates an alert for the deviation.

acceptance_criteria: Alarm is generated for temperature deviation
data_integrity_requirements: Alarm data must be accurate and timely

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system accurately monitors temperature within the specified range of -80°C to +50°C with ±0.5°C accuracy.
prerequisites: Test environment set to known temperature values

test_steps.action: Set the test environment to a known temperature within the range (e.g., 25°C).
test_steps.expected_result: System displays temperature reading within ±0.5°C of the reference device.

test_steps.action: Repeat the test at -20°C and +40°C.
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains accuracy within ±0.5°C at all tested temperatures.

acceptance_criteria: All temperature readings must be within ±0.5°C of the reference device values.
System must record and display temperatures correctly at all tested points.
data_integrity_requirements: All test data must be stored in the vendor's standard database format.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly integrates with the site paging system to send alarm notifications when temperature deviates ±2°C from setpoint.

test_steps.action: Set a temperature setpoint (e.g., 25°C) and induce a deviation of +2.5°C.
test_steps.expected_result: System generates an alarm and sends notification to the site paging system within 30 seconds.

test_steps.action: Repeat the test with a deviation of -2.5°C.
test_steps.expected_result: System generates an alarm and sends notification to the site paging system within 30 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Alarm notifications must be sent to the paging system within 30 seconds of deviation.
All alarm events must be recorded in the system's audit trail.
data_integrity_requirements: All alarm events must be recorded in the audit trail.

test_cases.objective: To verify that the EMS accurately monitors temperature within the specified range of -80°C to +50°C with an accuracy of ±0.5°C.

test_steps.action: Set the EMS to monitor temperature in a controlled environment.
test_steps.expected_result: EMS displays temperature readings within the specified range.

test_steps.action: Compare EMS temperature readings with the reference device readings.
test_steps.expected_result: EMS readings are within ±0.5°C of the reference device readings.
data_to_capture: Deviation between EMS and reference readings

acceptance_criteria: EMS temperature readings are within ±0.5°C of the reference device readings.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all temperature readings are accurately recorded and stored.

test_cases.objective: To validate that the EMS alarm notifications are correctly integrated with the site paging system using the vendor API.

test_steps.action: Simulate a temperature deviation of ±2°C from the setpoint in the EMS.
test_steps.expected_result: EMS generates an alarm condition.

test_steps.action: Verify that the alarm notification is received by the site paging system.
test_steps.expected_result: Site paging system receives and displays the alarm notification.
data_to_capture: Alarm notification details on paging system

acceptance_criteria: Alarm notifications are correctly received by the site paging system.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all alarm notifications are accurately transmitted and logged.

test_cases.test_name: Integration Test: Alarm Notification with Site Paging System
test_cases.objective: Verify that the EMS correctly integrates with the site paging system to send alarm notifications using the vendor API.
prerequisites: Site paging system configured and ready for integration

test_steps.action: Simulate a temperature deviation exceeding ±2°C from the setpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: EMS detects the deviation and triggers an alarm.

test_steps.action: Check the site paging system for the alarm notification.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm notification is received on the site paging system within 30 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Alarm notification is successfully sent to the site paging system within 30 seconds.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure alarm notifications are accurately logged and timestamped.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test: System Response Time for Alarm Conditions
test_cases.objective: Verify that the EMS responds to alarm conditions within the specified 30-second timeframe.

test_steps.action: Simulate a temperature deviation exceeding ±2°C from the setpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: EMS detects the deviation and triggers an alarm.

test_steps.action: Measure the time taken from deviation detection to alarm trigger.
test_steps.expected_result: Alarm is triggered within 30 seconds of deviation detection.

acceptance_criteria: EMS responds to alarm conditions within 30 seconds.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure response times are accurately logged and timestamped.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system generates alerts when temperature deviates ±2°C from the setpoint.

test_steps.action: Set the temperature setpoint to 25°C in the system configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts the setpoint and displays it correctly.

test_steps.action: Simulate a temperature reading of 27.1°C (exceeding +2°C deviation).
test_steps.expected_result: System generates an alert within 30 seconds.

test_steps.action: Simulate a temperature reading of 22.9°C (exceeding -2°C deviation).
test_steps.expected_result: System generates an alert within 30 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Alerts are generated within 30 seconds of deviation
Alert messages include correct temperature values
Alerts are logged in the audit trail
data_integrity_requirements: Alert data must be stored with timestamp and value
Audit trail must record alert generation

test_cases.objective: Verify successful integration between EMS and facility management system using standard protocols.

test_steps.action: Send a test temperature reading from EMS to facility management system.
test_steps.expected_result: Facility system receives and displays the reading within 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Trigger an alarm condition in EMS and verify notification in facility system.
test_steps.expected_result: Facility system displays alarm notification within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All transmitted values match source data
data_integrity_requirements: Transmitted data must match source values
Interface must maintain data integrity during transmission
